author: Ed Kilgore
title: Will Republican Governors Follow Trump’s Lead on Coronavirus Lockdowns?
description: Trump is currently listening to public-health experts on stopping the spread of COVID-19. But GOP governors on the front lines need to follow suit.
content: Theres an old joke I used to deploy as a gubernatorial speechwriter in which a governor was under fire for not standing with the president on some controversial issue where POTUS himself was showing happy feet. Id be happy to stand with the president, the gov… [+6249 chars]
